title: 162: Is Watching Sports a Waste of Time? | Ear Biscuits Ep. 162
description:
R&L reveal how they feel actually feel about watching sports, the psychology on why people tie themselves to a team or an athlete, and thoughts on LeBron coming to the Lakers.
